problem_names: lemma upd_globals_conv: "upd_globals f = (\<lambda>s. s\<lparr>globals := f (globals s)\<rparr>)"

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. upd_globals f = (\<lambda>s. s\<lparr>globals := f (globals s)\<rparr>)
